A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While easily not as boring as Force Awakens\, Last Jedi tramples over it's source material at every turn\, fails to turn it's bland characters into likeable do-gooders/villains\, and takes an abundance of logical missteps and jumps the shark enough to make a drinking out of the whole affair. At the end of day\, it's still the most enjoyable of the Disney Star Wars entries\, but that's not much of a compliment.
